#/bin/ash
apk update
apk add --no-cache git make gcc g++ python autoconf automake nasm build-base zlib zlib-dev libtool ca-certificates curl unzip sqlite gettext

        RELEASE_VERSION=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/sogehige/sogeBot/releases/latest" | awk -F '"' '/tag_name/{print $4}')

        curl -L -o sogebot.zip ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
        unzip -o sogebot.zip

elif [ "${RELEASE_VERSION}" == "master" ]; then
        git clone https://github.com/sogehige/sogeBot.git .
        cp src/bot/data/.* .
        mv .env.sqlite .env   
    
else
        DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/sogehige/sogeBot/releases/download/${RELEASE_VERSION}/sogeBot-${RELEASE_VERSION}.zip
        curl -L -o sogebot.zip ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
        unzip -o sogebot.zip
        rm sogebot.zip
fi

npm install -g npm@latest

#/usr/local/bin/npm install sqlite3 --save
#/usr/local/bin/npm install --save-dev electron-rebuild

if [ "${RELEASE_VERSION}" == "master" ]; then
    echo -e "## Compiling SourceCode with make && Downloading npm components"
